column1: how to get cost and time estimate of App ?
column2: you can share your full requirement or UI design (if mockup that is best) with me so i can share cost and time for it

column1: what is best way to start app development ?
column2: if you have clear requirement / requirement document / wireframe or UI design then we can start app work. but best is UI/UX design.
we provide iOS  Android flutter and website design and development (HTML CSS JS & LARAVEL). also we work on UI/UX graphic design.

column1: if i don't have design then are you able to make design ?
column2: yes  I can make design for you. just you need to make clear requirement with me.
yes  we can provide source code after work completed

column1: After order completed may i get support ?
column2: Yes  after completed order i am always here to help you. you can get 1 month bug support.

column1: flutter support both platform iOS & android ?
column2: yes   flutter support both platform iOS & android. if you want only in one platform then also possible.
